channel.title: [317]making players items drop when die[317]
channel.description: on my server when you die you keep all your items and stuff and i want it so you dont keep anything when you die. like when you get killed by a npc or when you get killed by a player can anybody help?

item.title: [317]making players items drop when die[317]
item.dc:creator: @TheImpureOne TheImpureOne
item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

I won’t spoon feed you but here are some hints…

Look in: public void youdied() also delete the boolean from player.java

item.title: [317]making players items drop when die[317]

item.description:
@_Urban wrote:

[quote=“Jeremy368, post:3, topic:293068”]wow this is fail… If its a 317 then there is a file CLEARLY labeled “NPCDrops.java” as well as a “NPCDrops.cfg” I am willing to bet anything you took one look at your source and said “idk wtf all this is” so you posted here.

We will not spoon feed you.[/quote]

Lol,epic fail.
Dude, read the problem clearly before you go around calling people a failure.
We’re not all good at this so don’t be mean -.-
